info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 25 at 3:41AM CDT until July 26 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...
Cedar River at Charles City affecting Floyd County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cedar River at Charles City.
* WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, the intersection of Riverside and North Illinois Streets may be flooded. Cable pedestrian bridge is closed.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 12.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 1215 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH
